subject: fix(charts): use repo-tor embed.js for iframe auto-sizing
body:
Replace custom useIframeAutoResize hook with repo-tor's new embed.js
helper script. The script auto-discovers all repo-tor iframes and
handles resize messages natively, eliminating the need for manual
origin validation, source matching, and per-iframe React state.

- Delete useIframeAutoResize hook (custom postMessage listener)
- Add useRepoTorEmbed hook (loads embed.js script once, idempotent)
- Simplify ActivityCharts and ActivityTimeline (remove refs, state,
  conditional styles â€” static Tailwind classes act as fallback until
  embed.js sets inline height)
- Update EXTERNAL_REFERENCES.md and CLAUDE.md
